1.2.name: wordpress/advanced-random-posts-thumbnail-widget
1.2.description:
Advanced Random Post Thumbnails Widget displays thumbnails grabbed randomly from posts. Each thumbnail is hyperlinked to the post it is taken from or optionally hyperlinked to its post's category. The widget is easy to configure. Visit Appearance > Widgets and drag the Advanced Random Post Thumb widget to a widget area.

Widget options include:

  1. Images are automatically grabbed from random posts.
  2. Can be set to grab a post's first attached image or first displayed image.
  3. A custom post field can be used to set the image to grab.
  4. Each thumbnail hyperlinks to the post it represents.
  5. Each thumbnail can be made to link to its post's category.
  6. Thumbnail sizes can be easily specified.
  7. Margins between images can be set.
  8. Image positioning/centering is a cinch using left and right buffer columns.
  9. Easily set a thumbnail to display for posts that lack images.
  10. Will display up to 2
